TM04.location: Saffron City Gym — reward for defeating Sabrina

TM06.location: Fuchsia City Gym — reward for defeating Koga

TM10.note: Also obtainable as an item in various locations

TM12.location: Game Corner prize — 1,500 coins (FR) / Route 12 item ball (LG)

TM13.location: Game Corner prize — 4,000 coins  OR  Seafoam Islands, B4F (item ball)

TM19.location: Celadon City Gym — reward for defeating Erika

TM21.location: Pokémon Fan Club, Vermilion City (talk to chairman)
TM21.note: Power depends on Pokémon's friendship (low happiness = high power)

TM22.location: Route 27 (item ball, post-National Dex area) or in-game trade reward

TM24.location: Game Corner prize — 4,000 coins  OR  Power Plant (item ball, FR)
TM24.note: One of the best Electric moves in FRLG

TM26.location: Viridian City Gym — reward for defeating Giovanni

TM27.location: Pokémon Fan Club, Vermilion City (talk to chairman)
TM27.note: Power depends on Pokémon's friendship (high happiness = high power)

TM28.location: Route 9 (item ball)  OR  Rocket Hideout, B2F (item ball)

TM29.location: Saffron City — given by Mr. Psychic (house south of Gym)

TM34.location: Vermilion City Gym — reward for defeating Lt. Surge

TM35.location: Game Corner prize — 4,000 coins  OR  Silph Co., 7F (item ball)

TM38.location: Cinnabar Island Gym — reward for defeating Blaine

TM39.location: Pewter City Gym — reward for defeating Brock

TM40.location: Game Corner prize — 1,500 coins (LG)  OR  Route 9 area (FR)

TM47.location: Game Corner prize — 2,500 coins  OR  Route 28 (post-National Dex)

TM49.location: Rocket Warehouse, Chrono Island — Five Island (post-National Dex)

TM50.location: Mt. Ember (item ball, after completing National Dex story quest)

HM01.location: S.S. Anne — Captain's cabin (given after curing his seasickness)

HM02.location: Route 16 — given by a girl in the house next to the cycling road gate
HM02.note: Required to reach Fuchsia City via the air route

HM03.location: Safari Zone — Secret House (far north-west corner, requires Strength)

HM04.location: Fuchsia City — given by the Safari Zone Warden after returning his Gold Teeth

HM05.location: Route 2, south — given by Professor Oak's Aide (need 10 caught Pokémon)

HM06.location: One Island, Kindle Road — given by a man on the road to Mt. Ember

HM07.location: Icefall Cave, Four Island (item ball inside the cave)
